org.cougaar.util
Class TimeSpan.Point

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.util.TimeSpan.Point
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, TimeSpan
Enclosing interface:
TimeSpan
public static class TimeSpan.Point
extends java.lang.Object
implements TimeSpan, java.io.Serializable

A representation of a point in time, generally the smallest time span which contains the specified time. Strictly speaking, this ought to be represeted differently than a span.

See Also:
TimeSpans.getPoint(long), Serialized Form
